short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your chats into neatly formatted PDF.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The add-on adds a button to the ChatGPT webpage and with just a quick click, you can turn your chats into neatly formatted PDF files. It's super easy to use - perfect for keeping or sharing your interactions. The add-on uses the PDFCrowd API to create PDF.

 Features:
- PDF page size and orientation
- Color theme selection
- Print selected sections only
- Option to exclude prompts from PDF
- Adjustable font size
- Customizable page margins

Install/Upgrade: To enable the button, open a tab with ChatGPT, click the puzzle icon in the toolbar, then click the three dots next to the plugin icon and confirm the permissions.
